definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: But the court did not rule on the constitutionality of the provision itself.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最高法院没有就这一条款的合宪性作出裁决。

sentences.english: And Congress comes to the Supreme Court with a presumption of deference and constitutionality.
sentences.chinese: 和国会的尊重和合宪性推定带有一个最高法院。

sentences.english: They evaluate the constitutionality of state laws under the state constitution.
sentences.chinese: 他们在州宪法下评估州法律的合宪性。

definition: preliminary question/priority problem/issues requiring more immediate attention
(mining) workability (of deposits of coal, ore etc)
